translation.en: [narrator] In the beginning, the great Frith made the world
translation.zh: ‎万物之初 伟大的太阳神创造了世界

translation.en: and he made the stars by scattering his droppings over the sky.
translation.zh:
‎他把自己的粪便洒向天空
‎创造了星星

translation.en: Now, El-Ahrairah was prince of the rabbits and he had so many wives and so many kits
translation.zh: ‎艾尔阿瑞拉是兔族的王子 ‎他妻妾众多 子嗣多不胜数

translation.en: that even Frith couldn't count them.
translation.zh: ‎连太阳神也计算不清

translation.en: They ate all the grass and clover in the entire world.
translation.zh:
‎这些小兔子
‎把全世界的青草和三叶草都吃光了

translation.en: Frith could have killed the prince rabbit there and then,
translation.zh: ‎太阳神本可以处死这位兔子王子

translation.en: but he needed him for his hijinks and tricks.
translation.zh: ‎但他又需要他的年少轻狂和足智多谋

translation.en: So, instead, he determined there would be a meeting
translation.zh: ‎于是他决定让全世界的动物

translation.en: of all the animals of the world, and upon each, he would bestow a gift.
translation.zh:
‎一起开一场大会
‎然后送给每种动物一件礼物

translation.en: Upon the homba, he gave great cunning.
translation.zh: ‎他赐给狐狸狡猾

translation.en: Upon the hawk, sharp talons.
translation.zh: ‎赐给鹰一对利爪

translation.en: Upon the cat, silent feet.
translation.zh: ‎赐给猫走路寂静无声的本领

translation.en: Upon the weasel, great speed.
translation.zh: ‎赐给黄鼠狼过人的奔跑速度

translation.en: Upon the wolf, great teeth. All to hunt and slay the children of El-Ahrairah.
translation.zh:
‎赐给狼锋利的牙齿 ‎这些都是为了让它们去
‎捕猎艾尔阿瑞拉的后代们

translation.en: These animals became the elil, the thousand enemies of rabbits.
translation.zh:
‎这些动物数以千计 它们都是
‎兔类的敌人 叫做“艾利尔”

translation.en: It was a few days later, when El-Ahrairah heard of all of this,
translation.zh: ‎几天后 艾尔阿瑞拉听说了这件事

translation.en: and went to see Frith.
translation.zh: ‎于是去面见太阳神

translation.en: [El-Ahrairah] You have condemned my people to lives of fear, Lord.
translation.zh: ‎你让我的子民陷入了恐惧之中 大人

translation.en: [Frith] Do you not wish to see what blessing I have for your people, Prince Rabbit?
translation.zh:
‎你不想看看我给了
‎你的后人什么恩赐吗 兔王子？

translation.en: [El-Ahrairah] To my bottom, give your blessings.
translation.zh: ‎请庇佑我的后人

translation.en: [Frith] Very well.
translation.zh: ‎那好

translation.en: Grow a tail to confuse those chasing you and legs to outrun them.
translation.zh:
‎我赐你一条能迷惑敌手的尾巴
‎比敌人速度更快的腿脚

translation.en: Grow ears to hear any of your thousand enemies from miles away.
translation.zh: ‎一双从几千米外就能听到动静的耳朵

translation.en: All the world will be your enemy, prince of a thousand enemies.
translation.zh:
‎这世界充斥着你们的敌人
‎你是有一千个敌人的王子

translation.en: And when they catch you, they will kill you.
translation.zh: ‎如果被他们捉住 你们会被杀死

translation.en: But first... they must catch you.
translation.zh: ‎不过前提是他们捉得到你们

translation.en: Digger, listener, runner...
translation.zh:
‎你们会挖洞 听觉灵敏 跑起来飞快
‎你是最机警的王子

translation.en: Prince with the swift warning, be cunning and full of tricks...
translation.zh:
‎你们会挖洞 听觉灵敏 跑起来飞快
‎你是最机警的王子 ‎你们狡诈机敏 招式繁多
‎你的子民绝无可能被彻底摧毁

translation.en: and your people will never be destroyed.
translation.zh:
‎你们狡诈机敏 招式繁多
‎你的子民绝无可能被彻底摧毁

translation.en: [Hazel] Fiver!
translation.zh: ‎多多！

translation.en: Fiver!
translation.zh: ‎多多！

translation.en: Fiver, where are you?
translation.zh: ‎多多 你在哪里？

translation.en: -[laughter] -[rabbit 1] I'm going to get you! [rabbit 2] Got you!
translation.zh:
‎-你被我抓到了
‎-抓到你了

translation.en: -[Hazel] Hello, little ones. -[rabbits] Hi, Hazel.
translation.zh:
‎-小家伙 你们好
‎-你好 ‎-榛子 你好
‎-榛子 你好

translation.en: Do you think there'll be a lot of does out this evening?
translation.zh: ‎今晚会不会有很多母兔子出来？

translation.en: Is that all you think about, Hawkbit?
translation.zh: ‎你满脑子都在想这些吗 狮齿菊？

translation.en: No, actually, but do you think there'll be lots of does out this evening?
translation.zh:
‎才没有 不过
‎你说今晚会不会来很多母兔呢？

translation.en: -[Dandelion] Give it a rest. -[Hawkbit] I was just asking.
translation.zh:
‎-你能不能别想这些了？
‎-我只是问问而已

translation.en: It's not all I think about, actually. There's lots of things I think about...
translation.zh:
‎我脑子里不是只想着这些
‎我想的事情可多了

translation.en: Fiver?
translation.zh: ‎多多

translation.en: Fiver?
translation.zh: ‎多多

translation.en: [Blackberry] The duration of each season has to be calculated by light values.
translation.zh:
‎季节的具体长度
‎要由光照的数量来计算

translation.en: -[Bluebell] I've stopped listening. -[Blackberry] I don't know why I bother.
translation.zh:
‎-我早就没专心听了 你知道吗？
‎-有时候我真是白费唇舌

translation.en: [Bluebell] Nope, but I did see...
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: Fiver?
translation.zh: ‎多多？

translation.en: [Hazel] Fiver?
translation.zh: ‎多多

translation.en: [Fiver] Oh, no. No. No.
translation.zh: ‎不是吧 不

translation.en: -[distant rumbling] -[Hazel] Fiver?
translation.zh: ‎多多

translation.en: -[Hazel] Wake up, Fiver. -[gasps and breathes heavily]
translation.zh: ‎多多

translation.en: You're having another nightmare, brother.
translation.zh: ‎你又做噩梦了 我的兄弟

translation.en: [pants] Hazel, it was the strangest dream.
translation.zh:
‎-榛子 刚刚的梦好奇怪啊
‎-没事的 多多

translation.en: It's okay, Fiver. Let's go get something to eat.
translation.zh:
‎-榛子 刚刚的梦好奇怪啊
‎-没事的 多多 ‎我们去找点吃的吧
‎我好像在溪边看到了一些苣苦菜

translation.en: I spotted some sow thistle down by the stream,
translation.zh:
‎我们去找点吃的吧
‎我好像在溪边看到了一些苣苦菜 ‎我已经好多天没吃过像样的食物了

translation.en: and I haven't eaten anything decent in days.
translation.zh: ‎我已经好多天没吃过像样的食物了

translation.en: I... I dreamt something was coming to Sandleford.
translation.zh: ‎我梦见一只怪物来到了桑德福德

translation.en: I think it might mean we're in danger, Hazel.
translation.zh: ‎我们可能会遇到危险 榛子

translation.en: Captain Holly was in it. There was a huge--
translation.zh: ‎梦里还有冬青队长 有一台巨大的…

translation.en: Captain Holly? Fiver, I think Captain Holly can take care of himself.
translation.zh: ‎冬青队长？ ‎多多 冬青队长能照顾好他自己

translation.en: They usually do in the Owsla.
translation.zh: ‎他们精英兔有这个本事

translation.en: I know, and no one likes hearing about someone else's dreams, but...
translation.zh:
‎我知道 我知道
‎谁都不喜欢听别人讲自己做的梦

translation.en: [Hazel] Huh. Dewdrop.
translation.zh:
‎-可是这次…
‎-露珠

translation.en: -I dreamt something was coming. -[does giggle]
translation.zh: ‎我梦见有件东西来到了桑德福德

translation.en: -My dream was about Captain Holly. -It's him again. [giggles]
translation.zh:
‎-还梦见了冬青队长 他…
‎-又是他

translation.en: -[whispers] Is he still looking? -Hazel.
translation.zh:
‎-他在看这边吗？
‎-榛子

translation.en: -Don't look at him. -Do you like him?
translation.zh: ‎不要看他 你喜欢他吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, look, Fiver, sow thistle! Finally, something good to eat.
translation.zh: ‎多多 你看 苣苦菜 总算有好吃的了

translation.en: [Scabious] Oi, you two. You know the rules.
translation.zh: ‎是你们两个 你们都知道规矩

translation.en: Sow thistle is reserved for members of the Owsla, don't you know that?
translation.zh:
‎苣苦菜要留给精英兔食用
‎你们不知道吗？

translation.en: -Move along. -[they cackle]
translation.zh: ‎给我走开

translation.en: "You know the rules." I'm sick of the rules.
translation.zh: ‎“你们都知道规矩” 我受够了规矩

translation.en: I wonder whether there's a place for us in this warren!
translation.zh:
‎这座兔场已经
‎快要没有我们的容身之处了

translation.en: There's too many rabbits and too little food without the Owsla stealing from us--
translation.zh: ‎兔子太多 能吃的好东西又太少 ‎精英兔还一直跟我们抢

translation.en: This is where it comes from... the thing in my dream.
translation.zh: ‎就是这个地方 我梦里的情景

translation.en: [breathes heavily] Look!
translation.zh: ‎你看

translation.en: The fields are filled with blood.
translation.zh: ‎梦里的田野被鲜血染透了

translation.en: It's only the light of sunset, Fiver.
translation.zh: ‎这只是日落时的光线 多多

translation.en: Brother, I know everyone thinks I'm strange.
translation.zh: ‎兄弟 我知道大家都觉得我很奇怪

translation.en: Even you sometimes, but you have to believe me.
translation.zh:
‎就连你有时也这样认为
‎但这次你一定要相信我

translation.en: Something will come to this place... something foul and fierce.
translation.zh:
‎我们这儿会发生可怕的事
‎恐怖而暴力

translation.en: -We need to warn everyone. -But we're outskirters, Fiver.
translation.zh:
‎-我们得警告大家
‎-我们都是局外人 多多

translation.en: People don't listen to us.
translation.zh: ‎他们不会听我们的

translation.en: Well, we must make them listen.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须让他们听我们的话

translation.en: How do you propose we do that?
translation.zh: ‎你打算怎么做？

translation.en: Go away. He's busy.
translation.zh: ‎滚远点 他忙得很

translation.en: We only need a few moments with the Threarah.
translation.zh: ‎我们只占用山梨统领一点点时间

translation.en: We wouldn't ask if it weren't important.
translation.zh:
‎要不是事情紧急
‎我们也不会来打扰你

translation.en: All right, go on.
translation.zh: ‎好吧 去吧

translation.en: But if I get my head bitten off, I'll come looking for you.
translation.zh:
‎但如果你们害得我被咬
‎我一定找你们算账

translation.en: [Threarah] So, you were saying, your brother senses things.
translation.zh: ‎你的意思是 你兄弟能预知一些事？

translation.en: Uh, yes. Sometimes images in his head.
translation.zh: ‎是的 他脑子里有时会出现一些画面

translation.en: And... [sighs] I don't know how to say it, but he was right before.
translation.zh:
‎不知道该怎么描述
‎但他以前做过正确的预测

translation.en: -He knew the flood was coming last autumn. -Oh, I see.
translation.zh:
‎-比如去年秋天的洪水
‎-这样啊

translation.en: And what has he, um, sensed this time? [munches]
translation.zh: ‎这一次他感知到了什么？

translation.en: I don't know what it is, but it's bad.
translation.zh:
‎我也说不清楚
‎但情况很严重 真的很严重

translation.en: It's so bad. You have to get everyone to leave tonight, Threarah, please.
translation.zh:
‎我也说不清楚
‎但情况很严重 真的很严重 ‎你一定要让大家离开这里
‎今晚就走 山梨统领 拜托你了

translation.en: My goodness. Everyone? Tonight?
translation.zh: ‎不是吧 ‎全部都走？今晚就走？

translation.en: [chuckles] The entire warren, and you want me to tell them that we all have to go?
translation.zh: ‎你一句话 整个兔场就要全体出走？

translation.en: Well, I'll give that some very serious thought.
translation.zh: ‎我可得好好考虑一下

translation.en: You're not listening. There is no time.
translation.zh: ‎你没听懂我的意思 已经没有时间了

translation.en: I can feel the danger like a wire around my neck!
translation.zh:
‎我感觉到危险正在来袭
‎像一根铁丝缠住我的脖子

translation.en: Threarah, you have to act now... Now! [echoes]
translation.zh: ‎山梨统领 请马上行动起来 马上！

translation.en: Bigwig!
translation.zh: ‎大毛头！

translation.en: Hazel, I think your brother needs to rest for a while.
translation.zh: ‎榛子 我看你兄弟需要休息一会

translation.en: Take him out for some fresh air.
translation.zh: ‎请你带他去呼吸一下新鲜空气

translation.en: -No, but... -Shh. Yes, Threarah.
translation.zh:
‎-不要 可是…
‎-是 山梨统领

translation.en: [Threarah] I told you I wanted to be left alone, fool!
translation.zh: ‎我不是说了 不许外人打扰我 白痴

translation.en: And you let a bunch of outskirters...
translation.zh: ‎你却让两个外来的家伙…

translation.en: Hazel... Hazel. That was our answer.
translation.zh: ‎榛子 这就是我们得到的答案

translation.en: We have to go.
translation.zh: ‎我们必须离开这里

translation.en: Are you really sure, Fiver?
translation.zh: ‎你真的很有把握吗 多多？

translation.en: I'm telling you now as your brother, as your friend...
translation.zh:
‎作为你的兄弟 你的朋友
‎我郑重地告诉你

translation.en: this warren will soon be laid waste.
translation.zh: ‎这座兔场很快就会变成一片废墟

translation.en: We can leave now, or we can be destroyed with it.
translation.zh:
‎我们可以现在离开
‎也可以跟它一起被毁

translation.en: We need to spread the word to as many rabbits as possible, but be careful.
translation.zh: ‎好的 我们得尽量多告诉一些兔子 ‎但是你得小心

translation.en: If the Owsla get wind of this, there will be trouble.
translation.zh: ‎如果被精英兔听到 我们就麻烦了

translation.en: Bluebell, Blackberry, there's a danger coming.
translation.zh: ‎蓝钟花 黑莓 危险要来了

translation.en: Hey, listen. There's a danger coming to Sandleford. Hazel will lead us to safety.
translation.zh:
‎你们听我说 危机即将侵袭桑德福德 ‎榛子会带我们到安全的地方去
‎到桥下的太阳神荒原跟我们碰头

translation.en: Join us at Frith Down under the bridge.
translation.zh:
‎榛子会带我们到安全的地方去
‎到桥下的太阳神荒原跟我们碰头

translation.en: Good heavens. I mean, good gracious. I mean, that is to say...
translation.zh: ‎老天爷啊 我的神啊 也就是说

translation.en: Hazel, if your brother has taken firm stock in such a portent--
translation.zh:
‎榛子
‎如果你兄弟对这个征兆如此笃定…

translation.en: What Blackberry's trying to say is, we're in!
translation.zh: ‎黑莓的意思是 我们跟你们走

translation.en: Hey, there's a danger coming to Sandleford.
translation.zh: ‎危机即将降临桑德福德

translation.en: Hazel will lead us to safety.
translation.zh: ‎榛子会带我们到安全的地方去

translation.en: Join us at Frith Down, under the bridge.
translation.zh: ‎到桥下的太阳神荒原跟我们碰头

translation.en: What was all that about?
translation.zh: ‎这是怎么一回事？

translation.en: But I don't understand.
translation.zh: ‎可我真的不明白

translation.en: -Sandleford is our home, Hazel. -Look, there's a danger coming.
translation.zh:
‎-桑德福德是我们的家 榛子
‎-听我说 危险要来了

translation.en: My brother sensed it. He's often right about these things.
translation.zh:
‎我兄弟能感知到
‎以前他的预感都是对的

translation.en: What if it's more dangerous out there than here?
translation.zh: ‎可是外面会不会跟这里一样危险？

translation.en: We're meeting at Fu Inle, by the cattle grid.
translation.zh: ‎我们月落时分在牲口栅栏那里碰头

translation.en: Come with us.
translation.zh: ‎跟我们去吧

translation.en: Come with me.
translation.zh: ‎跟我走吧

translation.en: Let me think about it, okay?
translation.zh: ‎让我考虑一下 好吗？

translation.en: Dewdrop? Dewdrop?
translation.zh: ‎露珠？ ‎露珠？

translation.en: It's Blackberry and Bluebell, and we've brought Hawkbit and Dandelion, too.
translation.zh: ‎是黑莓和蓝钟花 ‎我们还带上了狮齿菊和蒲公英

translation.en: -Get down here before you're seen! -Right you are.
translation.zh:
‎-快趴下 别被发现了
‎-没问题

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, this everyone?
translation.zh: ‎等等 就你们几个吗？

translation.en: Where are the does? I presumed there'd be does.
translation.zh: ‎母兔呢？我以为会有母兔子

translation.en: [sighs] This can't be everyone. It can't be.
translation.zh: ‎不可能将大家都带走 做不到

translation.en: Maybe we should go back, convince the others.
translation.zh:
‎或许我们应该再回去
‎劝说大家一起走

translation.en: -[Fiver] She's not coming, Hazel. -[small clang and all gasp]
translation.zh: ‎她不会来的 榛子

translation.en: There's been more and more of those strange things recently.
translation.zh: ‎像这种怪东西最近越来越多了

translation.en: -They come from humans. -[Blackberry] Fascinating.
translation.zh: ‎都是人类带来的 ‎有意思

translation.en: All right. Let's go.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我们走吧

translation.en: Not so fast!
translation.zh: ‎先别急着走

translation.en: Owsla.
translation.zh: ‎精英兔

translation.en: You're all under arrest for spreading dissension and inciting to mutiny.
translation.zh:
‎竟敢传播谣言 意图谋反
‎你们都被逮捕了

translation.en: You more than anyone need to listen, Captain Holly.
translation.zh: ‎你一定要听我的 冬青队长

translation.en: Something is coming to this place, something foul and fierce.
translation.zh: ‎这里会发生大事 恐怖而暴力的事

translation.en: Just let us go.
translation.zh: ‎放我们走吧

translation.en: Even if you are bigger, there are more of us.
translation.zh: ‎虽然你块头大 但我们的数量更多

translation.en: We fancy it'd be a good fight.
translation.zh: ‎真的打起来 你并不占优势

translation.en: The Threarah nearly tore my ears off tonight after I'd let you in.
translation.zh:
‎今天晚上 因为我放你们进去
‎山梨统领差点扯掉我的耳朵

translation.en: Told me I'm lucky I'm not kicked out of the Owsla!
translation.zh: ‎他说 他没把我赶出精英兔行列

translation.en: Lucky to still have my privileges. Well...
translation.zh: ‎让我继续享有特权 都算是我走运

translation.en: -Well, I'm sick of being in the Owsla. -Thlayli!
translation.zh:
‎-我已经受够了做精英兔
‎-长毛…

translation.en: I'm sick of being in this warren!
translation.zh: ‎我受够了这座兔场的生活

translation.en: I'm sick of obeying your orders and towing the line!
translation.zh:
‎不想再听你们的命令
‎循规蹈矩地过日子了

translation.en: Thlayli, be careful, now. Think about what you're doing.
translation.zh: ‎长毛 你当心 想想你到底在做什么

translation.en: Go now, Captain Holly, or we'll kill the lot of you.
translation.zh:
‎你走吧 冬青队长
‎不然我们会对你们大开杀戒

translation.en: Someone told them what you're up to.
translation.zh: ‎你们的行动一定是被泄露给了他们

translation.en: We need to move before they come back with the entire Owsla.
translation.zh:
‎我们得赶快走
‎不然整个精英兔部队都会赶过来

translation.en: Along the line of the stream and through the meadow, then into the woods. Come on!
translation.zh:
‎各位 沿着小溪走 穿过草地
‎然后进入树林 快

translation.en: [Bluebell] Do you think this is where the black rabbit of Inle lives?
translation.zh:
‎这里会不会就是
‎地狱黑兔生活的地方？

translation.en: In a stone warren of dead rabbits, filled with disease and death?
translation.zh:
‎一座石头兔场 到处堆积着兔子死尸
‎疾病和死亡横行？

translation.en: [Blackberry] Please stop talking.
translation.zh: ‎拜托别说话了

translation.en: [Bluebell] With black eyes that burn like the fires of hell
translation.zh: ‎他黑色的双眸燃烧着地狱的火焰

translation.en: and a cold, grey expression, with sorrow beyond imagining.
translation.zh:
‎他深色冷峻而阴沉
‎透着难以言喻的悲伤

translation.en: Bluebell, you're making everyone nervous.
translation.zh: ‎蓝钟花 你这样会让大家很紧张

translation.en: Hazel, this was your plan. Where are we going?
translation.zh:
‎榛子 计划是你想的
‎我们到底去哪里？

translation.en: We need to get clear of the old warren, then I guess we'll find somewhere to stay.
translation.zh:
‎我们先逃离旧兔场 ‎-然后可能再找个地方住下
‎-什么？“可能”？

translation.en: You guess? He guesses. Who's leader here, anyway?
translation.zh:
‎-然后可能再找个地方住下
‎-什么？“可能”？ ‎你也是乱猜的 到底谁是领袖？

translation.en: No one by the looks of it. -[Holly] They're up ahead! -[gasping]
translation.zh:
‎-我看根本没有领袖
‎-他们就在前面

translation.en: -Owsla. -Everyone run!
translation.zh:
‎-精英兔
‎-大家快跑

translation.en: [rabbit] Get them!
translation.zh: ‎抓住他们

translation.en: Quick, go! Come on!
translation.zh: ‎大家快上

translation.en: -They're getting away! -Close them down!
translation.zh: ‎看 他们在逃跑 ‎把他们包围

translation.en: This is a nice surprise, Hazel!
translation.zh: ‎真是惊喜啊 榛子

translation.en: I say we go deeper into the trees and hide.
translation.zh:
‎-要不藏在树林深处吧？
‎-不 不行

translation.en: -No. We have to cross the river here. -Cross it? Maybe some of us could,
translation.zh:
‎-我们必须过河去
‎-过河？ ‎有几只兔子也许能过去
‎但你和蓝钟花已经累得没有力气

translation.en: but you and Bluebell are worn out.
translation.zh:
‎有几只兔子也许能过去
‎但你和蓝钟花已经累得没有力气

translation.en: If Fiver says we cross here, we cross here.
translation.zh: ‎多多让我们过河 那我们就过河

translation.en: [Owsla 1] They're here. I see 'em!
translation.zh: ‎他们在这边 我看见了

translation.en: -[Bluebell] Faster. Faster! -[Owsla 2] Get 'em!
translation.zh:
‎-快点 他们要追上了
‎-抓住他们

translation.en: We'll never outrun them now. We're done for.
translation.zh: ‎我们根本跑不过他们

translation.en: [Owsla 2] Go on! Get 'em!
translation.zh:
‎-我们死定了
‎-抓住他们

translation.en: -Faster! -[Owsla 3] They're getting away!
translation.zh: ‎快点 他们要逃走了

translation.en: -[Bluebell] Faster, they're catching up! -[Hazel] Blackberry, any suggestions?
translation.zh:
‎-快点 再快一点 他们要追上了
‎-黑莓 有什么建议吗？

translation.en: I had a rather splendid idea, but the blasted thing disappeared again.
translation.zh:
‎我本来有个绝妙的点子
‎可是那该死的东西又消失了

translation.en: About... uh, about the strange things that Fiver and I saw,
translation.zh: ‎那怪东西 我和多多见过那个怪东西

translation.en: the human things that move on top of the river, on top of the...
translation.zh:
‎是人类发明的
‎它能在河面上来回移动

translation.en: It's... It's... It was...
There!
translation.zh: ‎它就在那边

translation.en: -Everybody follow me! -[panting]
translation.zh: ‎大家都跟我来

translation.en: [Owsla 2] Where're they going?
translation.zh: ‎他们要去哪？

translation.en: -Here! Quick. Get on this thing. -[grunting]
translation.zh:
‎-来 赶快 站在这东西上
‎-大家快来

translation.en: [rabbit] What's going on? -[Blackberry] Push it into the water. -[grunting]
translation.zh:
‎-现在怎么办？
‎-你们俩 快把它推到水里去

translation.en: Push!
translation.zh: ‎推啊

translation.en: -[Owsla 1] Quick! -[yelling]
translation.zh:
‎-那里
‎-水变深了

translation.en: -[Blackberry] Hold on with your paws. -What are they doing?
translation.zh:
‎大家抬高前爪 ‎-他们在干什么？
‎-什么情况？

translation.en: [rabbit] Go upstream!
translation.zh:
‎-看 他们要逃…
‎-水流快点吧

translation.en: -[Holly] This way! -[Owsla 1] Come on, lads. Faster.
translation.zh: ‎在这边 ‎快点 大家都快点

translation.en: -[grunts] -[Holly] Try and find a way across.
translation.zh: ‎我找路穿过去

translation.en: -[yelling] -[Owsla] Quick! Get 'em!
translation.zh: ‎快 抓住他们

translation.en: Get 'em.
translation.zh: ‎抓住他们

translation.en: -[Holly] Cut them off! -[Owsla 1] Come on, Toadflax!
translation.zh: ‎截住他们 ‎快点 柳穿鱼 快

translation.en: -Come on! -[grunting]
translation.zh: ‎快点 柳穿鱼 快

translation.en: -[Owsla 1] Come on! -They're getting away!
translation.zh:
‎-快啊
‎-抓住他们

translation.en: [Blackberry] Kick! Kick! Kick!
translation.zh: ‎踢 快踢

translation.en: -Keep kicking! -[Holly] Go, go, go, go!
translation.zh:
‎-继续踢
‎-快点 快快快

translation.en: -[grunting] -Come on!
translation.zh: ‎快

translation.en: I'll see you again, Bigwig! I promise you that!
translation.zh: ‎我们还会再见的 大毛头 我跟你保证

translation.en: And next time, there won't be a river between us!
translation.zh: ‎下次就不会有这条河挡在中间了

translation.en: Oh, I'm counting on it. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我等着这一天

translation.en: [Bluebell] Everybody listen up! Now that I'm official storyteller...
translation.zh:
‎大家都听我说 ‎我决定
‎担任咱们这个兔子群的讲故事员

translation.en: I've decided I am the official storyteller of the group, by the way.
translation.zh: ‎既然我当上了正式的讲故事员

translation.en: I'll have to make it into a legendary tale.
translation.zh: ‎我要好好讲述这个传奇的故事

translation.en: "The Story of How Hazel Led Our Escape Over the Raging Rapids."
translation.zh: ‎榛子率领我们逃离湍急洪流的故事

translation.en: It was Blackberry who had the idea.
translation.zh: ‎这是黑莓想出的办法

translation.en: [Bluebell] But you stayed calm and led us on our way.
translation.zh:
‎是的 但你保持了冷静的头脑
‎一路引领我们

translation.en: I tell you, he is what I call a Chief Rabbit. Hazel-rah!
translation.zh:
‎我告诉你们 他就是一只兔子酋长 ‎-榛子统领！
‎-榛子统领！兔子酋长

translation.en: Hazel-rah! Chief Rabbit! [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-榛子统领！
‎-榛子统领！兔子酋长

translation.en: Frith in a wasps' nest!
translation.zh: ‎我的太阳神啊

translation.en: The day I call you Chief Rabbit, Hazel, that'll be the day.
translation.zh:
‎如果有一天我要称呼你兔子酋长
‎那真是奇迹出现了

translation.en: I'll stop fighting that day, and all.
translation.zh: ‎到时候我一定会老老实实不打架了

translation.en: [Hawkbit] I know we have to find a new home,
translation.zh: ‎我明白我们要找个新家

translation.en: but we're like sitting ducks out here in the open.
translation.zh:
‎可是这样开阔的地方
‎我们只能坐以待毙

translation.en: And why does it have to be so far away?
translation.zh: ‎为什么一定要走那么远？

translation.en: -I guess because Fiver says. -"Because Fiver says."
translation.zh:
‎-因为多多是这样说的
‎-“因为多多这样说”

translation.en: Fiver says a lot of things. What if Fiver says jump out of a bush and tickle a wolf?
translation.zh:
‎多多说过很多话 ‎如果他让你灌木里跳出来
‎让你去逗弄饿狼 你去不去？

translation.en: "Because Fiver says!" Hazel's no fool, Hawkbit.
translation.zh:
‎-因为多多这样说
‎-榛子不是傻子 狮齿菊

translation.en: He knows we need to take Fiver with a pinch of salt now and then.
translation.zh: ‎他明白有时多多的话不能全都照做

translation.en: -[Hazel] What was that? -Up ahead. Through the hedge.
translation.zh:
‎-那是什么东西？
‎-往前走 穿过篱笆

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: ‎这是什么？

translation.en: Doesn't smell natural.
translation.zh:
‎-闻着不像天然的东西
‎-这是一条公路

translation.en: It's a road. Have you never seen one before or something?
translation.zh:
‎-闻着不像天然的东西
‎-这是一条公路 ‎你从来没见过吧？

translation.en: Don't know much about things, do you, Hazel-rah?
translation.zh: ‎你不懂的事情还很多 “榛子统领”

translation.en: Why don't you teach me, Bigwig?
translation.zh: ‎欢迎你的赐教 大毛头

translation.en: [sighs] The men put the black stuff there, so that the hrududil can run on it.
translation.zh:
‎这是人类铺设的黑色东西
‎呼嘟嘟可以在上面跑

translation.en: They're harmless, so long as you leave them alone by night.
translation.zh: ‎它们通常无害 只是晚上不要靠近

translation.en: See that? They don't hurt you.
translation.zh: ‎看见了吗？它们不会伤害你

translation.en: As a matter of fact, I don't think they're alive.
translation.zh: ‎其实我觉得它们是没有生命的

translation.en: You say they're not dangerous, Bigwig, but look at that.
translation.zh: ‎你说它们没有威胁 大毛头 可是你看

translation.en: A yona... Why would it kill a yona?
translation.zh: ‎刺猬 它为什么要杀死一只刺猬？

translation.en: Yonil hunt at night. That's what I'm trying to say to you.
translation.zh: ‎刺猬晚上出来捕食 ‎我刚刚不是说了吗

translation.en: In the dark, the hrududil have big lights and they draw creatures close.
translation.zh: ‎晚上的呼嘟嘟都有巨大的灯 ‎会引来各种动物

translation.en: And if they shine on you, you go tharn...
translation.zh: ‎如果光照在你身上 你就会吓得僵住

translation.en: and then they crush you.
translation.zh: ‎它们就会轧死你

translation.en: You let me know if you want me to teach you anything else, Hazel.
translation.zh:
‎如果有别的东西需要我教
‎就跟我说 榛子

translation.en: We have to keep moving.
translation.zh: ‎我们得继续赶路

translation.en: There's too many elil at night to stay still without a warren.
translation.zh:
‎夜晚的敌人太多 我们没有兔场
‎不能呆在一个地方不动

translation.en: Come on!
translation.zh: ‎快走

translation.en: [Hazel] Fiver!
translation.zh: ‎多多！

translation.en: What is it?
translation.zh: ‎怎么了？

translation.en: There, that's where we're going.
translation.zh: ‎那里 我们到那里去

translation.en: That down.
translation.zh: ‎去那片荒原

translation.en: That's our home.
translation.zh: ‎那里是我们的家

translation.en: We head for the down.
translation.zh: ‎到那片荒原去

translation.en: -[Hawkbit] Where are we going to sleep? -[Bluebell] Yeah, where?
translation.zh:
‎-我们在哪里睡觉啊 榛子？
‎-是啊 在哪里睡觉？

translation.en: [Hawkbit] There'll be more elil out soon. It's far too late to dig scrapes.
translation.zh:
‎很快又会有更多敌人出来活动
‎现在挖地道又有点太迟了

translation.en: Shh.
translation.zh: ‎嘘

translation.en: -[Fiver] Bigwig! I thought-- -Quiet, Fiver. Something's here.
translation.zh:
‎-大毛头！
‎-别出声 多多 ‎-好像有什么东西…
‎-有东西

translation.en: -[Bigwig] What is it? -Maybe it's the black rabbit of Inle.
translation.zh:
‎是什么？ ‎-说不定是地狱黑兔子
‎-胡说八道 没有那种东西

translation.en: Nonsense. There's no such thing.
translation.zh:
‎-说不定是地狱黑兔子
‎-胡说八道 没有那种东西

translation.en: -Wake up now. -[Hazel] Bigwig. What's going on?
translation.zh:
‎-大家快醒醒
‎-发生什么事了？ ‎大毛头！怎么了？

translation.en: Corvil! A reckoning of them!
translation.zh:
‎-是乌鸦 应该是乌鸦
‎-怎么了？

translation.en: We should run.
translation.zh: ‎我们还是跑吧

translation.en: -Let me try and talk to them. -Talk to them? Hazel, no!
translation.zh:
‎-我去跟他们谈谈
‎-谈什么？榛子 不可以

translation.en: We understand that this might be your home.
translation.zh: ‎我们明白 这里可能是你们的家

translation.en: We are only here because we've got nowhere else to go. [grunts]
translation.zh: ‎我们没有地方可去 才到这里来的

translation.en: -[squawks] -Get him off me! [groans]
translation.zh: ‎放开我

translation.en: Someone should draw them away, give the rest of us a chance.
translation.zh:
‎谁去把他们引开
‎让其他兔子有机会逃走

translation.en: Are you mad? You'll never outrun a corva!
translation.zh: ‎说什么疯话？谁跑得过乌鸦！

translation.en: I'll go.
translation.zh: ‎我去

translation.en: He's serious.
translation.zh: ‎他真的去了

translation.en: -[cawing] -[Blackberry] That is one fast rabbit.
translation.zh: ‎这兔子跑得真快

translation.en: [Hazel] He's got 'em distracted. Let's go!
translation.zh: ‎他引开了他们的注意 我们快走

translation.en: There he is. No! Dandelion! Put him down!
translation.zh: ‎他在那边 不要 蒲公英 快把他放下

translation.en: [Hawkbit] Run, Dandelion, run!
translation.zh: ‎快跑 蒲公英 快跑

translation.en: One step closer and I'll pull your tail feathers out
translation.zh:
‎你敢再过来一步
‎我就扯下你尾巴的羽毛

translation.en: and stuff them down your throat, you embleer corva!
translation.zh: ‎塞进你的喉咙 你这只臭乌鸦

translation.en: [Bigwig] All right, day's breaking, we should stop.
translation.zh: ‎好了 天已经破晓 我们歇歇脚吧

translation.en: [Hazel] No. We keep moving.
translation.zh: ‎不行 我们得继续赶路

translation.en: Are you giving me an order, Hazel?
translation.zh: ‎你在对我下命令吗 榛子？

translation.en: Because I didn't realise anyone had made you Chief Rabbit!
translation.zh: ‎好像没有兔子选你做兔子酋长吧

translation.en: After all, it was me who helped us escape Sandleford.
translation.zh: ‎毕竟是我带大家逃出了桑德福德

translation.en: Blackberry who rescued us at the stream.
translation.zh: ‎在河边 是黑莓救了我们

translation.en: Oh, and Dandelion who saved us from your stupid mistake with the birds!
translation.zh:
‎你对那些白痴的鸟犯下的错误
‎是蒲公英救了大伙

translation.en: We followed you here,
translation.zh: ‎我们跟随你来到这里

translation.en: because you promised us a better life, Hazel, a better life!
translation.zh:
‎是因为你许诺会给我们更好的生活
‎榛子 更好的生活

translation.en: [sighs] Things will improve when we reach the down.
translation.zh: ‎等到了那片荒原 就会好起来的

translation.en: [guffaws] Yes, yes! The down.
translation.zh: ‎对 荒原

translation.en: The place we're heading for no reason other than Fiver had a feeling about it!
translation.zh:
‎因为多多的所谓“直觉”
‎我们就要毫无理由地往那边赶

translation.en: Well, as there's no does here, I'm going to attempt to dig myself a scrape.
translation.zh:
‎好吧 既然在座的没有母兔
‎我决定挖一条地道

translation.en: Is that okay? Not because I want to rest, but because this is where I'm staying!
translation.zh:
‎可以吗？不仅仅是为了休息
‎我要在这里定居

translation.en: Bigwig was right. I'm not a leader.
translation.zh: ‎大毛头说得对 我不是领袖

translation.en: I'm not strong like him.
translation.zh: ‎我没有他强壮

translation.en: I'm not smart like Blackberry.
translation.zh: ‎没有黑莓聪明

translation.en: I'm not fast like Dandelion.
translation.zh: ‎没有蒲公英跑得快

translation.en: And I don't have stories to lift everyone's spirits like Bluebell.
translation.zh:
‎不能像蓝钟花一样
‎能讲故事鼓舞大家的士气

translation.en: Or visions to keep us from harm like you.
translation.zh: ‎又没有预知本领 带大家逃离灾难

translation.en: You've led us this far, and none of us are dead.
translation.zh:
‎你带领我们走了这么远
‎我们一个都没死

translation.en: -Isn't that a miracle in itself? -It's blind luck is what it is.
translation.zh:
‎-这难道不是奇迹吗？
‎-纯粹是走运而已

translation.en: -[distant thunder] -We could use another dose of that now.
translation.zh: ‎现在我们很需要运气

translation.en: What on earth is that rabbit doing?
translation.zh: ‎那只兔子到底在干什么？

translation.en: Who are you, and what do you want?
translation.zh: ‎你是谁？你想干什么？

translation.en: My name is Cowslip. I come from a warren just across the field here.
translation.zh:
‎我叫野樱草
‎我来自田野对面的一座兔场

translation.en: I don't want anything from you.
translation.zh:
‎我对你们没有任何企图 你们好像
‎很疲惫 是不是走了很远的路？

translation.en: -You look tired. Have you come a long way? -So what if we have?
translation.zh:
‎我对你们没有任何企图 你们好像
‎很疲惫 是不是走了很远的路？ ‎那又怎么样？
‎我们依然有自我保护的本领

translation.en: That doesn't mean we can't defend ourselves.
translation.zh:
‎那又怎么样？
‎我们依然有自我保护的本领

translation.en: I don't doubt that for one second. Our warren's not as big as we'd like,
translation.zh:
‎我没有怀疑你们的能力 ‎我们的兔场不算特别大
‎但那里有足够的食物

translation.en: but there's enough food to go around.
translation.zh:
‎我们的兔场不算特别大
‎但那里有足够的食物

translation.en: And if you'd like to live with us, we'd welcome you.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们愿意跟我们一起生活
‎我们很欢迎

translation.en: These scrapes don't look too comfortable. There's more heavy storms on their way.
translation.zh: ‎你们的地道好像也不是太舒服 ‎而且很快就要下暴雨了

translation.en: Anyway, if you'll excuse me. I hate the rain.
translation.zh: ‎好了 我失陪了 我讨厌下雨

translation.en: Well, that was unexpected.
translation.zh: ‎真没想到是这样

translation.en: Uh, we're going, right?
translation.zh: ‎那我们去吧

translation.en: He seemed nice. I liked him. Let's go. Let's go right now.
translation.zh:
‎他好像人不错 我喜欢他
‎我们走吧 现在就去

translation.en: But why did he invite us there? It makes no sense to share with us.
translation.zh:
‎他为什么邀请我们？
‎他何必跟我们分享资源？

translation.en: -I've got a feeling-- -Here we go.
translation.zh:
‎-我有种预感…
‎-又来了

translation.en: I've got a feeling we should have nothing to do with that rabbit or his warren,
translation.zh:
‎我预感我们不该跟那只兔子扯上关系
‎别去他的兔场

translation.en: that we ought to leave this place at once and head to the down.
translation.zh: ‎离开这里 到荒原去

translation.en: -What do you think, Hazel? -Yeah. We all know what Hazel thinks.
translation.zh:
‎-你怎么想 榛子？
‎-好了好了 ‎大家都知道榛子怎么想
‎他跟多多想法一致

translation.en: [mocks] He thinks the same as Fiver!
translation.zh:
‎大家都知道榛子怎么想
‎他跟多多想法一致

translation.en: I think we should go to Cowslip's warren.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们应该到野樱草的兔场去

translation.en: These scrapes are no good in this weather
translation.zh:
‎这样的天气 我们的地道撑不住
‎为了找个地方取暖 睡上一觉

translation.en: and I fancy taking the chance to get warm and have some sleep.
translation.zh:
‎这样的天气 我们的地道撑不住
‎为了找个地方取暖 睡上一觉 ‎我愿意冒险一试

translation.en: [Bigwig] Sky above us. Every living creature for miles must know that's there!
translation.zh:
‎我的天啊 ‎方圆几公里的小动物
‎一定都知道它的存在

translation.en: Everyone, keep your wits about you.
translation.zh: ‎大家都提高警惕

translation.en: Friends...
translation.zh: ‎各位朋友

translation.en: We're glad you've come.
translation.zh: ‎很高兴你们来了

translation.en: Allow me to take you down...
translation.zh: ‎我带你们先去吧

translation.en: to the Great Burrow.
translation.zh: ‎到大洞去

translation.en: -[gasping and muttering] -Look at that...
translation.zh: ‎看那边

translation.en: [Blackberry] Look at the roof! The roots of the tree keep it stable. It's genius!
translation.zh:
‎你们看它的屋顶 ‎大树构成的屋顶让它非常稳固
‎真是天才的设计

translation.en: Clever rabbits!
translation.zh: ‎这些兔子真聪明

translation.en: [Hawkbit] Look at the size of them! They could rip us to pieces!
translation.zh:
‎你们看他们多么高大
‎他们几口就能把我们撕成碎片

translation.en: Hazel, may I be the first to welcome you all to our warren?
translation.zh:
‎榛子 请允许我
‎第一个欢迎你们来到我们的兔场

translation.en: Thank you. We're glad to be here.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 我们也很高兴来到这里

translation.en: This is a fine warren you have.
translation.zh: ‎你们的兔场真不错

translation.en: When you said it wasn't as big as you'd like,
translation.zh: ‎之前你说它不是很大

translation.en: we were expecting something a lot smaller. Were there more of you living here once?
translation.zh: ‎我们还以为会很小 ‎以前这里生活着更多的兔子吗？

translation.en: Why don't you just settle in here?
translation.zh: ‎你们在这里安顿下来吧

translation.en: I think you'll find there's everything you'll ever need.
translation.zh: ‎这里有你们需要的一切资源

translation.en: I've got a bad feeling, Hazel. Why are all the rabbits here so big?
translation.zh: ‎我有种很不好的感觉 榛子 ‎这里的兔子为什么都那么高大？

translation.en: [Hazel] Fiver, it's just for one night.
translation.zh: ‎多多 我们只是住一夜而已

translation.en: -It'll be okay. -Hello, you must be Hazel.
translation.zh:
‎-没事的
‎-你好 你就是榛子吧？

translation.en: My name's Strawberry! I'm so excited to make friends with you.
translation.zh:
‎我叫草莓 ‎在这里见到你
‎我太激动了 好想跟你交朋友

translation.en: Unless you don't want to be friends. It's fine if you don't.
translation.zh:
‎除非 你不想跟我交朋友
‎如果你拒绝我 我也能理解

translation.en: We can be friends.
translation.zh: ‎我们可以做朋友

translation.en: Oh! Brambles! I knew we'd get on! Come on! I'll take you a tour of the warren.
translation.zh:
‎太棒了 我就知道我们一定合得来 走 ‎我带你们参观一下这座兔场
‎我很擅长当导游

translation.en: I'm pretty good at tours, by the way.
translation.zh:
‎我带你们参观一下这座兔场
‎我很擅长当导游

translation.en: Uh, we'd love to.
translation.zh: ‎我们非常乐意

translation.en: There are so many empty burrows, plenty of room for you all.
translation.zh: ‎这里有很多空置的洞 你们都住得下

translation.en: I'll find you a burrow close to mine, so if you've got any questions,
translation.zh:
‎我在我的洞附近给你们找一个
‎这样如果你有什么问题

translation.en: you can come and say, Strawberry...
translation.zh:
‎就随时过来找我
‎只要喊一句“草莓”…

translation.en: -Why are there so many empty burrows? -I don't know.
translation.zh:
‎为什么这里有那么多空着的兔子洞？ ‎我也不知道
‎可能这里有白盲病传染吧

translation.en: -Perhaps they had the white blindness. -[Strawberry chatters on]
translation.zh:
‎我也不知道
‎可能这里有白盲病传染吧 ‎我家乡的人总是说 朋友就是家人

translation.en: -[sniffs] -[Strawberry chatters]
translation.zh: ‎我家乡的人总是说 朋友就是家人

translation.en: Can't smell any signs of the disease.
translation.zh: ‎不过我闻不到病菌的气味

translation.en: [Strawberry] Here we are. Newcomers don't usually come here,
translation.zh: ‎就是这里了 ‎新来客一般不可以到这里来

translation.en: but since we're officially best friends, I'm going to make an exception.
translation.zh:
‎但既然我们是最好的朋友
‎我就例外一次

translation.en: [Strawberry] Enchanting, isn't it?
translation.zh: ‎很美妙吧？

translation.en: A rabbit called Laburnum did it.
translation.zh: ‎这是一只叫金链花的兔子雕刻的

translation.en: We call it a shape.
translation.zh: ‎我们叫它“塑像”

translation.en: It's where we come to give praise to Frith.
translation.zh: ‎我们都来这里赞美太阳神

translation.en: But what... what's it for?
translation.zh: ‎可是它有什么用途？

translation.en: Careful! We don't want to damage it. We're so blessed to have it.
translation.zh:
‎小心 可不要破坏了它
‎能拥有它是我们的福气

translation.en: It's such a special place to come to, especially when you're feeling sad.
translation.zh:
‎这个地方非常特别
‎伤心的时候最适合来这里

translation.en: What do you make of all this, Fiver? Fiver?
translation.zh: ‎你怎么看 多多？ ‎多多？

translation.en: [Strawberry] Kingcup!
translation.zh: ‎驴蹄草

translation.en: Kingcup, come and meet Hazel.
translation.zh: ‎驴蹄草 快来见见榛子

translation.en: Oh, I didn't realise.
translation.zh: ‎我忘了

translation.en: He's gone.
translation.zh: ‎他已经走了

translation.en: It's getting late. Let's find a place for you all to sleep!
translation.zh: ‎不早了 大家找个地方睡觉吧

translation.en: -Hazel! -Ah! What... What's going on?
translation.zh:
‎榛子 ‎-怎么了？干什么？
‎-没事 小傻瓜

translation.en: Nothing, silly goose! Come on. We need to get some flayrah. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-怎么了？干什么？
‎-没事 小傻瓜 ‎走 我们去弄点好吃的

translation.en: Flayrah! It's far too early to go raiding gardens for lettuce.
translation.zh:
‎好吃的？
‎这么早就去莴苣菜园偷菜吃吗？

translation.en: Frith in a basket! Flayrah!
translation.zh: ‎我的太阳神啊 有好吃的

translation.en: Try it. It's a carrot.
translation.zh: ‎尝尝吧 这是胡萝卜

translation.en: Well?
translation.zh: ‎怎么样？

translation.en: How is it?
translation.zh: ‎好吃吗？

translation.en: [mouth full] Horrible. Uh-uh. I wouldn't bother. I wouldn't bother... Oh!
translation.zh: ‎很难吃 你们都别吃 都别吃

translation.en: -[chuckling] -[Hawkbit] Oh, yes.
translation.zh: ‎太棒了

translation.en: so juicy.
translation.zh: ‎好多汁啊

translation.en: -[grunting] -This is delicious.
translation.zh: ‎太美味了

translation.en: Oh, I'm in heaven.
translation.zh: ‎我好像进了天堂

translation.en: This place is better than heaven.
translation.zh: ‎这里比天堂更美好 这里有胡萝卜

translation.en: -This place has carrots! -[Hawkbit] Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎这里比天堂更美好 这里有胡萝卜 ‎好棒

translation.en: Oh. Oh, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎好棒

translation.en: [Hawkbit] Mm. Oh. Oh. Take it away from me. No, leave it here.
translation.zh: ‎把它拿开吧 不 放在这里好了

translation.en: You need to get control of Fiver.
translation.zh: ‎你得管管多多

translation.en: This place is perfect. We don't want the rabbits here thinking
translation.zh: ‎这座兔场多么完美 我不希望因为他

translation.en: we don't appreciate their hospitality because of him, all right?
translation.zh:
‎让这里的兔子觉得
‎我们不感激他们的好客 好吗？

translation.en: I'll talk to him.
translation.zh: ‎我会跟他谈的

translation.en: Oh, Fiver, have you been out here all night in the rain?
translation.zh:
‎多多
‎你冒着雨在这里呆了一整晚吗？

translation.en: Why don't you eat some of the flayrah?
translation.zh: ‎为什么不出来吃点好吃的？

translation.en: Eating food that's been left by men? No, I'll have nothing to do with it.
translation.zh: ‎吃人类给的食物？不了 我才不要

translation.en: -Are you trying to make me angry? -I'm the one who should be angry.
translation.zh:
‎-多多 你想惹我生气吗？
‎-该生气的是我

translation.en: These rabbits... there's something about them that's sad and lost,
translation.zh: ‎这些兔子… ‎身上充满了悲伤 他们迷失了

translation.en: like trees in November. I've got a feeling that there's something--
translation.zh:
‎就像11月的树木
‎我预感这里有种…

translation.en: What proof have we got that your feelings have ever been right?
translation.zh:
‎有什么证据能证明
‎你的预感都是对的？

translation.en: Why didn't you have a feeling about the birds?
translation.zh:
‎你为什么没预感到
‎那些鸟会袭击我们？

translation.en: Maybe the truth is there never was anything bad back at the old warren!
translation.zh:
‎说不定真相是
‎我们过去的兔场根本不会有灾难发生

translation.en: Maybe we left everything behind because of you for no reason!
translation.zh: ‎说不定你害得我们白白逃跑一场

translation.en: Maybe I left Dewdrop for no reason! [exhales]
translation.zh: ‎说不定我根本不必离开露珠

translation.en: Dewdrop was the one who told the Owsla we were leaving!
translation.zh:
‎是露珠向精英兔出卖了
‎我们出逃的消息

translation.en: -Hazel, I heard her telling Captain Holly. -[exhales] No, I don't believe you.
translation.zh:
‎-榛子 我亲耳听见她跟冬青队长告密
‎-不 我不相信你

translation.en: -Hazel, you know I wouldn't make this up. -Go back into that warren,
translation.zh:
‎榛子 你知道我不可能编造这种事 ‎马上回那个兔场去
‎不然我会亲自拖着你去

translation.en: or I will drag you in there myself.
translation.zh:
‎马上回那个兔场去
‎不然我会亲自拖着你去

translation.en: -No, Hazel, I won't. I won't go back! -Go!
translation.zh:
‎-不 榛子 我不要 我不回去
‎-快去

translation.en: Hazel, I have to say, this place, it's paradise.
translation.zh:
‎榛子 我不得不说
‎这地方真是世外桃源

translation.en: I've got my own burrow. There's a lot of very nice does here, let me tell you,
translation.zh:
‎我有了自己的洞穴
‎这里住着很多和蔼的母兔

translation.en: and the food... no wonder these scoundrels are so fat!
translation.zh: ‎还有这么棒的食物 ‎难怪这些混蛋吃得这么肥硕

translation.en: And I just... I don't know. I just wanted to say that...
translation.zh: ‎我…我只想对你说

translation.en: I was wrong about you.
translation.zh: ‎之前我错怪了你

translation.en: I'll follow you anywhere.
translation.zh: ‎你去哪里我都跟着

translation.en: -To Hazel. -To Hazel.
translation.zh:
‎-为榛子干杯
‎-为榛子干杯

translation.en: -Hazel-rah! -Hazel-rah!
translation.zh:
‎-榛子统领
‎-榛子统领

translation.en: Hazel-rah! Huh! Frith's beard.
translation.zh: ‎榛子统领？去你的吧

translation.en: You did well. Don't let it go to your head.
translation.zh:
‎你的确做得不错 ‎-榛子 但是不要得意忘形
‎-各位

translation.en: Everyone! Everyone!
translation.zh:
‎-榛子 但是不要得意忘形
‎-各位 ‎各位 大家来欢迎新的来客
‎讲几个故事听听吧

translation.en: I thought we might welcome our new guests by hearing some stories.
translation.zh:
‎各位 大家来欢迎新的来客
‎讲几个故事听听吧

translation.en: Yes, we have a wonderful storyteller amongst our number... Bluebell.
translation.zh:
‎好 我们中间有一位出色的讲故事员
‎他叫蓝钟花

translation.en: Did you just give me a compliment, Blackberry?
translation.zh: ‎黑莓 你是在夸赞我吗？

translation.en: -I didn't think you liked me! -I didn't say I liked you...
translation.zh:
‎-我不知道你这么喜欢我
‎-我没说喜欢你 ‎我只说你很会讲故事

translation.en: -What...? -From this moment on, we're inseparable!
translation.zh:
‎我只说你很会讲故事 ‎-你干什么？
‎-我们从此再也不分开

translation.en: Does and bucks, and kits up passed their burrow-times,
translation.zh:
‎各位公兔和母兔
‎各位过了时间还没去睡的小兔子们

translation.en: I give you the story of El-Ahrairah and the king's lettuce.
translation.zh:
‎我来给你们讲一个
‎艾尔阿瑞拉和莴苣国王的故事

translation.en: -[distant chanting] -There was a time when El-Ahrairah and his followers lost all their luck.
translation.zh:
‎曾经有一段时期
‎艾尔阿瑞拉与他的信众时运不济

translation.en: Their enemies drove them out and they were forced to live
translation.zh: ‎被敌人驱赶出来

translation.en: down in the marshes of Kelfazin. Now, where the marshes...
translation.zh: ‎只好居住在凯法辛沼泽 ‎这些沼泽…

translation.en: -[distant chanting] -[sniffs]
translation.zh: ‎这些沼泽…

translation.en: [all chant] Devoted are we to the path he decides.
translation.zh: ‎我们虔诚地坚守他所选的路

translation.en: Praise be to Frith for our food.
translation.zh: ‎赞美太阳神赐予我们食物

translation.en: Blessed are we to be his humble servants.
translation.zh: ‎你我有幸做他的卑微奴仆

translation.en: Wise are we to accept his will.
translation.zh: ‎听从他的命令才是智慧之道

translation.en: Devoted are we to the path....
translation.zh: ‎我们虔诚地…

translation.en: [Bluebell] And from that day to this,
translation.zh: ‎从那一天起 直到今日

translation.en: no power on earth can keep a rabbit out of a vegetable garden
translation.zh: ‎没有兔子进不去的蔬菜园

translation.en: for El-Ahrairah prompts them with 1,000 tricks!
translation.zh:
‎因为艾尔阿瑞拉传授了
‎他们一千种绝招

translation.en: -The best in the world! -[cheering]
translation.zh: ‎招招都是世间绝技

translation.en: -The best in the world! -Nice one, Bluebell.
translation.zh:
‎-世间一流的绝招
‎-好厉害 讲得真好

translation.en: That was very nice. We don't tell the old stories much.
translation.zh: ‎讲得真不错 ‎我们很少讲过去的故事

translation.en: El-Ahrairah doesn't mean much to us.
translation.zh: ‎艾尔阿瑞拉对我们来说意义并不大

translation.en: But he was a trickster! Rabbits always need tricks.
translation.zh:
‎但他最擅长使花招
‎兔子永远离不了花招

translation.en: No, rabbits need dignity
translation.zh: ‎不 兔子要有尊严

translation.en: and the will to accept what Frith has decided for them.
translation.zh: ‎我们应该接受太阳神做出的安排

translation.en: [chanting] Devoted are we to the path he decides.
translation.zh: ‎我们虔诚地坚守他所选的路

translation.en: Frith lies in the evening sky.
translation.zh: ‎太阳神悬挂在夜空

translation.en: The clouds are red about him.
translation.zh: ‎周边是一圈红云

translation.en: I am here, Lord Frith.
translation.zh: ‎太阳神 我的主 我来了

translation.en: I am running through the long grass.
translation.zh: ‎我从那长草丛中奔腾而来

translation.en: Oh, take me with you.
translation.zh: ‎请带我跟你走

translation.en: -[whimpers] -Dropping behind the woods, far away, to the heart of the light.
translation.zh:
‎粪便都在林木后头
‎离光明的核心非常远

translation.en: The silence.
translation.zh: ‎好寂静

translation.en: For I am ready to give you my breath, my life.
translation.zh: ‎愿向你献上我的呼吸 我的性命

translation.en: This rabbit, he... he smells like wounds.
translation.zh: ‎这只兔子散发着伤口的气味

translation.en: -Like pain and rot. -[Silverweed] ...yellow and brown.
translation.zh: ‎疼痛和腐烂的气味 ‎黄的黄 棕的棕

translation.en: [Fiver] Hazel! Hazel, the roof! The roof here is made of bones!
translation.zh:
‎榛子 你看屋顶
‎这里的屋顶是白骨做的

translation.en: They're not bones, Hrairoo. They're tree roots... [echoes]
translation.zh: ‎那不是白骨 小千 ‎那是树根 都是树根而已

translation.en: They're not bones...
translation.zh: ‎那是树根 都是树根而已

translation.en: Far away... into the earth, we go!
translation.zh: ‎我们深入地底

translation.en: [Silverweed] Ready, with the berries.
translation.zh: ‎我们祈祷 ‎带着浆果…

translation.en: -Stay here, Bigwig. I'll deal with this. -Don't tell me what to do.
translation.zh:
‎-你留在这里 大毛头 我来处理
‎-你别对我下命令 榛子

translation.en: You had your chance to deal with Fiver. Now it's my turn.
translation.zh:
‎让你管好多多 你做不到 ‎-现在轮到我了
‎-我愿跟随你

translation.en: I will go with you. I will be rabbit of the leaves, in the deep...
translation.zh:
‎-现在轮到我了
‎-我愿跟随你 ‎我会做一只吃叶子的兔
‎在这深邃的…

translation.en: Fiver! You wretched little black beetle!
translation.zh: ‎多多 ‎你这个可恶的小混蛋

translation.en: You're one tantrum away from getting us all kicked out!
translation.zh:
‎这样胡乱发疯
‎会害得我们都被赶走的

translation.en: [pants] I'm sorry, but I'm going to the down.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我到荒原去了

translation.en: You wouldn't have a hope in hell! You'd be dead before night-Frith.
translation.zh:
‎你才不可能走得到那里
‎天黑之前就会送命

translation.en: You are closer to death than I, Bigwig. This place is death.
translation.zh:
‎你离死神比我更近 大毛头
‎这个地方到处都是死亡

translation.en: There is shadow in every corner of it.
translation.zh: ‎每个角落都有阴影

translation.en: Hazel, you said that you could never make a good leader
translation.zh: ‎榛子 之前你说 你的速度不够快

translation.en: because you're not the fastest, nor the strongest nor the smartest,
translation.zh:
‎不够强壮和聪慧
‎所以做不了出色的领袖

translation.en: but what makes a great leader is that you believed in us...
translation.zh: ‎可真正的领袖伟大之处在于相信大家

translation.en: and brought out the best in us.
translation.zh: ‎让部下都能发挥自己的长处

translation.en: Goodbye, brother.
translation.zh: ‎再见 我的兄弟

translation.en: Fiver, wait!
translation.zh: ‎多多 等等

translation.en: If you say this place is rotten, then it's rotten and we leave.
translation.zh:
‎你说这里充满腐败
‎那我相信你 我们走

translation.en: We began this adventure together, we'll finish it together.
translation.zh:
‎我们一起开始了这场历险
‎那我们就一起完成它

translation.en: I'll go and tell the others we need to leave.
translation.zh: ‎我去告诉其他兔子 我们得离开

translation.en: I'm not letting you get to the others, Hazel.
translation.zh: ‎我才不让你去蛊惑其他兔子 榛子

translation.en: If you want to leave, go. The rest of us are staying here.
translation.zh: ‎要走你自己走 大伙们都会留下

translation.en: -Let me go, Bigwig. -You're not Chief Rabbit, Hazel!
translation.zh:
‎放开我 大毛头 ‎你不是兔子酋长 榛子
‎你永远都做不到

translation.en: You never will be! If you want to take the crazy dream of your brother
translation.zh:
‎你不是兔子酋长 榛子
‎你永远都做不到 ‎你弟弟那些神经质的白日梦
‎如果你愿意相信

translation.en: as reality, then do it elsewhere!
translation.zh:
‎你弟弟那些神经质的白日梦
‎如果你愿意相信 ‎那请你到别处去 不要来打扰我们

translation.en: You're finished here!
translation.zh: ‎那请你到别处去 不要来打扰我们

translation.en: I'm going back to the warren now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在就回兔场去

translation.en: If you follow me there, I'll kill you both.
translation.zh: ‎如果你跟我去 我把你们都杀掉

translation.en: -[groans] -Hazel, something's got him.
translation.zh: ‎榛子 他好像受伤了

translation.en: Oh! Thlayli?
translation.zh: ‎长毛

translation.en: -Thlayli! Listen! You're in a snare. -[gasps for breath]
translation.zh: ‎长毛 ‎你听我说 你中了捕兔绳套

translation.en: Now, what did they teach you to do in the Owsla?
translation.zh: ‎精英兔是怎么教你的？

translation.en: Bigwig, tell me what to do! Fiver, get the others.
translation.zh:
‎大毛头 告诉我该怎么做 ‎-多多 快去叫其他兔子来
‎-咬…

translation.en: Dig, bite. [gasps for breath]
translation.zh: ‎挖…咬

translation.en: -Bigwig's in a snare! Come quick! -[gasping]
translation.zh: ‎大毛头中了捕兽圈套 大家赶快来

translation.en: Nobody leaves. Frith has decided that it is Bigwig's turn.
translation.zh:
‎谁都不许走
‎既然太阳神决定 大毛头的时辰到了

translation.en: -And so it will be. -Turn! What do you mean turn?
translation.zh: ‎那就顺其自然好了 ‎时辰？这话什么意思？

translation.en: A day less for one means a day more for us all.
translation.zh:
‎一只兔子的牺牲
‎意味着我们能多活一天

translation.en: -[chant] A day more for all. -Now, listen here. For the last few days,
translation.zh:
‎-我们能多活一天
‎-你们都听着 ‎过去这几天我和我的朋友们遭到追杀
‎逃过了利爪 险些被咬死、溺死

translation.en: me and my friends have been chased, clawed, bitten, drowned
translation.zh:
‎过去这几天我和我的朋友们遭到追杀
‎逃过了利爪 险些被咬死、溺死

translation.en: and if you don't get out of the way now--
translation.zh: ‎如果现在你不让我们走…

translation.en: You'll find out why we've made it this far.
translation.zh: ‎就让你见识一下我们的生存本领

translation.en: Let them leave, Cowslip!
translation.zh: ‎让他们走吧 野樱草！

translation.en: Out of our way!
translation.zh: ‎给我让路

translation.en: Fools! Think you're any safer out there than you are here?
translation.zh:
‎一群白痴
‎你们以为外面比这里安全吗？

translation.en: You'll be dead by sunset.
translation.zh: ‎天黑之前你们准会没命

translation.en: -Hazel, is he alive? -I don't know. He told me to dig and bite.
translation.zh:
‎-榛子 他还活着吗？
‎-不知道 他让我挖土和啃咬

translation.en: -Bigwig? Oh, no. -[chokes]
translation.zh: ‎大毛头 不

translation.en: -[Hazel] Hold on. Hold on. -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎等等

translation.en: It's narrower down there. We can bite through.
translation.zh: ‎下面更窄一些 我们可以啃透它

translation.en: -Hurry. -Fiver, come on. You're the smallest.
translation.zh: ‎快点 多多 去吧 你体型最小

translation.en: -Quickly, brother. Come on, Fiver. -Come on!
translation.zh:
‎-快点 兄弟 快啊 加油 多多
‎-加油

translation.en: -There has to be something else we can do. -[groans]
translation.zh: ‎我们再想想别的办法

translation.en: Bigwig, you hold on! You hold on!
translation.zh: ‎大毛头 坚持住 再坚持一下

translation.en: -Come on! -Hold on, Bigwig.
translation.zh:
‎-快点 你一定行的 多多
‎-撑住 大毛头

translation.en: [Hazel] Hurry, you can do it, Fiver! Quickly, brother!
translation.zh:
‎-快点 你一定行的 多多
‎-撑住 大毛头 ‎-快一点 兄弟
‎-不行 这没用

translation.en: -[gags] -[Hazel] Bigwig, stop!
translation.zh:
‎-快一点 兄弟
‎-不行 这没用 ‎大毛头 别挣扎

translation.en: -Push this thing. -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎推一下这个东西

translation.en: -[grunting] -[Blackberry] It's getting tighter.
translation.zh: ‎它越来越紧了 大毛头 别再拉扯了

translation.en: -Bigwig, stop pulling. -[Hazel] He's almost there.
translation.zh: ‎它越来越紧了 大毛头 别再拉扯了 ‎就快行了 他马上就可以了

translation.en: Bigwig! Bigwig!
translation.zh: ‎大毛头

translation.en: [pants] It's out. You're free.
translation.zh: ‎解开了 你自由了

translation.en: I can't hear him breathing.
translation.zh: ‎我听不见他的呼吸声

translation.en: [all] My heart has joined the thousand, for my friend stopped running today.
translation.zh:
‎我的心悲痛哭泣
‎因为我的朋友从今日起失去了生命

translation.en: Fiver, clean your face now. The smell of blood will attract elil.
translation.zh:
‎多多 擦擦你的脸
‎血的气味会引来敌人

translation.en: -Mm. -Where are the other rabbits?
translation.zh: ‎其他兔子呢？

translation.en: -They tried to stop us coming to help. -They what?
translation.zh:
‎-他们拦着我们 不让我们来帮忙
‎-什么？

translation.en: Cowslip said it was Frith's will.
translation.zh: ‎野樱草说 这是太阳神的旨意

translation.en: That a day less for one means a day more for everyone else.
translation.zh:
‎一只兔子的牺牲
‎能让其他兔子多活一天

translation.en: -Uh, Bigwig? -[grunts]
translation.zh: ‎大毛头？

translation.en: Oh, Bigwig, you're all right!
translation.zh: ‎大毛头 你竟然没事

translation.en: I thought I'd lost you, brother.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为你已经不行了 兄弟
‎你可以走吗？

translation.en: -Do you think you can walk? -I can try.
translation.zh:
‎我还以为你已经不行了 兄弟
‎你可以走吗？ ‎我可以试试

translation.en: The man who set this snare's going to be back soon. Let's go.
translation.zh:
‎设下绳套的人
‎很快就会再来 我们走吧

translation.en: -[twig snaps] -Shh, shh, who's that?
translation.zh: ‎嘘 谁来了？

translation.en: You've a nerve coming here.
translation.zh:
‎-你还敢到这里来
‎-求求你们

translation.en: Please, I didn't know Cowslip would try and stop you.
translation.zh:
‎-你还敢到这里来
‎-求求你们 ‎我不知道野樱草会阻拦你们

translation.en: I'd like to come with you, if you'd have me.
translation.zh:
‎我想跟你们走 ‎-如果你们愿意收留我
‎-我们为什么要收留你？

translation.en: And why should we? Why don't you go back to all your friends in there?
translation.zh:
‎-如果你们愿意收留我
‎-我们为什么要收留你？ ‎回去找你的朋友去吧

translation.en: I don't... I don't have any friends.
translation.zh: ‎不 我没有朋友

translation.en: People don't like to make friends here in case they get...
translation.zh:
‎这里的兔子互相不交朋友
‎免得对方…

translation.en: You can come, Strawberry, but it's our ways.
translation.zh:
‎你可以跟我们走 草莓
‎但必须听我们的

translation.en: If we say hop, you hop. Understood?
translation.zh: ‎我们让你快跳 就得快跳 明白吗？

translation.en: Now what? Where do we go from here?
translation.zh: ‎现在怎么办？我们去哪里？

translation.en: We should go back and kill Cowslip! We should kill the lot of them!
translation.zh:
‎我们应该回去杀掉野樱草
‎把他们全都杀光

translation.en: No, Bigwig. There's no need to go and fight them.
translation.zh: ‎不 大毛头 没有必要跟他们斗

translation.en: -All we have to do is to leave them there. -[coughs]
translation.zh: ‎只要留他们在这 他们迟早灭亡

translation.en: The down that you saw, you... you really had a feeling about that?
translation.zh:
‎之前你看到的荒原
‎你预感那里会幸福？

translation.en: Yes, I did, Bigwig. That down is our home.
translation.zh:
‎是的 大毛头
‎那片荒原会是我们的家园

translation.en: [pants] We made it.
translation.zh: ‎我们到了

translation.en: There's great views all around.
translation.zh: ‎这四周的景色真美

translation.en: We'll be able to see any elil coming from miles away.
translation.zh:
‎如果有敌人进攻
‎我们从公里外就能看到

translation.en: Well done, Hazel-rah.
translation.zh: ‎你真棒 榛子统领

translation.en: [Blackberry] In terms of digging a warren, we'll investigate
translation.zh: ‎挖掘兔场的时候 ‎一定要先调查挖的是什么样的土壤

translation.en: what type of soil we're dealing with and make a more comprehensive...
translation.zh: ‎一定要先调查挖的是什么样的土壤 ‎然后再进行详尽的…

translation.en: Stop trying to kiss me! That is not a thing we do! Bluebell!
translation.zh:
‎不要再偷偷亲我了
‎我们不可以这样 蓝钟花！

translation.en: [Holly] Zorn.
translation.zh: ‎完了

translation.en: Oh, Zorn.
translation.zh: ‎完了

translation.en: Zorn! [inhales sharply]
translation.zh: ‎完了

translation.en: Captain Holly?
translation.zh: ‎冬青队长

translation.en: -[Blackberry] What's happened to him? -[groans]
translation.zh: ‎他这是怎么了？

translation.en: Sandleford... it's gone.
translation.zh: ‎桑德福德 已经完了

translation.en: It's all gone! [breathes heavily]
translation.zh: ‎全都完了

translation.en: Fiver... you were right about everything!
translation.zh: ‎多多 你说得一点都没错

translation.en: [inhales and groans] You knew the story before it was even told.
translation.zh: ‎那件事还没发生 你竟然已经知道了

translation.en: There's something else.
translation.zh: ‎还有

translation.en: You're not safe here.
translation.zh: ‎你们在这里也不安全

translation.en: [groans] No one is safe!
translation.zh: ‎谁都不安全

translation.en: Sir, the wide patrol picked up the scent of a large band of rabbits near the down.
translation.zh:
‎长官 ‎我们的探子在荒原附近
‎闻到一大群兔子的气味

translation.en: Unfortunately, sir, they lost them.
translation.zh: ‎可惜被他们逃掉了 长官

translation.en: Tell them not to return until they're located.
translation.zh: ‎找不到这群兔子 就不许他们回来

translation.en: Leave one alive for questioning.
translation.zh: ‎留一个活口回来审问
